course_description: This writing-intensive seminar explores to what end music is used in political films. How does music affect our perception of political films? How does music manipulate our feelings for or against the subject matter?
sections: Class Nbr: 5566, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: L. Emmery, Status: Open
